property.value: Действие для фильтрации доступных действий "Направить на согласование"

property.name: conditionErrorMessage
property.value:
Заданный в документе типовой маршрут согласования не может быть запущен (не соответствует условиям доступности).
Документ будет отправлен по заданному маршруту с пометкой "нетиповой".

property.name: conditionErrorMessage
property.value: Маршрут согласования не создан, документ не может быть отправлен на согласование. Создайте маршрут

property.name: conditionErrorMessage
property.value: В маршруте не найдено участников, от которых требуется вынесение решения. Измените маршрут или обратитесь к администратору

property.name: condition
property.value: !@signingRoutesService.hasEmployeesInRoute(doc.nodeRef) OR (@signingRoutesService.hasEmployeesInRoute(doc.nodeRef) AND ((@signingRoutesService.isAllEmployeesInRouteHasBusinessRole(doc.nodeRef, "LECM_ES_SIGNERS") AND doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required") == true) OR doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required") != true))

property.value: Перед выполнением регистрации требуется обработать запрос на отмену зарезервированных регистрационных данных

property.name: actionScript
actionScript
transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/module/eds-documents-repo/workflow/scripts/eds-auto-approval.js">
var msg = 'Документ ' + documentScript.wrapperDocumentLink(stm_document, '{lecm-document:ext-present-string}') + ' был автоматически отправлен на доработку в связи с превышением срока согласования';
AutoApprovalScript.doAuto(stm_document, 'REJECTED_AUTO', msg, 'REJECTED_AUTO');

property.name: transitionExpression
property.value: @approvalRoutesService.getState(doc.nodeRef).contains("APPROVED") AND @routesGlobalSettingService.isAutoRoutingAfterApproval() AND !doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signed-on-paper") AND ((@signingRoutesService.getState(doc.nodeRef) == "NEW" AND @signingRoutesService.isRouteAllowedForEmployeeFromAssoc(doc.nodeRef) AND (@signingRoutesService.hasEmployeesInRoute(doc.nodeRef) AND !@signingRoutesService.hasUnresolvedMacros(doc.nodeRef)) AND (doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")!=true or (doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")==true and @signingRoutesService.isAllEmployeesInRouteHasBusinessRole(doc.nodeRef, "LECM_ES_SIGNERS")))) or ((@signingRoutesService.getHistoryIterationsCount(doc.nodeRef) > 0 or "COMPLETE" == doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signingState") or @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef)!=null) and @signingRoutesService.isRouteAllowedForEmployeeFromAssoc(doc.nodeRef, @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef)) AND (doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")!=true or (doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")==true and @signingRoutesService.isAllEmployeesInRouteHasBusinessRole("LECM_ES_SIGNERS", @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef))))))

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/module/eds-documents-repo/workflow/scripts/eds-auto-approval.js">
var msg = 'Документ ' + documentScript.wrapperDocumentLink(stm_document, '{lecm-document:ext-present-string}') + ' автоматически согласован в связи с превышением срока согласования';
AutoApprovalScript.doAuto(stm_document, 'APPROVED_AUTO', msg, 'APPROVAL_AUTO');

property.name: transitionExpression
property.value: @approvalRoutesService.getState(doc.nodeRef).contains("APPROVED") AND (!@routesGlobalSettingService.isAutoRoutingAfterApproval() OR doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signed-on-paper") OR (@signingRoutesService.getWorkingFolder(doc.nodeRef) == null or (@signingRoutesService.getState(doc.nodeRef) != "NEW" AND @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef) == null )) OR (@signingRoutesService.getState(doc.nodeRef) == "NEW" AND !(@signingRoutesService.isRouteAllowedForEmployeeFromAssoc(doc.nodeRef) AND (@signingRoutesService.hasEmployeesInRoute(doc.nodeRef) AND !@signingRoutesService.hasUnresolvedMacros(doc.nodeRef)) AND (doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")!=true or (doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")==true and @signingRoutesService.isAllEmployeesInRouteHasBusinessRole(doc.nodeRef, "LECM_ES_SIGNERS"))))) or ((@signingRoutesService.getHistoryIterationsCount(doc.nodeRef) > 0 or "COMPLETE" == doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signingState") or @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef)!=null) and !(@signingRoutesService.isRouteAllowedForEmployeeFromAssoc(doc.nodeRef, @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef)) AND (doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")!=true or (doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")==true and @signingRoutesService.isAllEmployeesInRouteHasBusinessRole("LECM_ES_SIGNERS", @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef))))) ) )

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
conditionErrorMessage
property.value: Действие «Завершить работу» доступно Контролеру ОРД, Регистратору ОРД

property.name: actionScript
transitionExpression
property.value: doc.hasAspect("lecm-eds-aspect:child-change-signal") AND doc.attr("lecm-eds-aspect:child-change-signal-count") != 0 AND !@routesGlobalSettingService.isAutoRoutingAfterApproval() AND doc.assocClass("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc") != null AND !doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:registration-required") AND doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signed-on-paper")

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
transitionExpression
property.value: doc.attr("lecm-review-ts:active-reviewers")!=null AND doc.attr("lecm-review-ts:active-reviewers")!="" AND !@routesGlobalSettingService.isAutoRoutingAfterApproval() AND doc.assocClass("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc") != null AND !doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:registration-required") AND doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signed-on-paper")

property.name: transitionExpression
property.value: doc.attr("lecm-ord:transit-to-on-execution")==true AND @ordDocumentService.getOrdDocumentPoints(doc.getNodeRef()).size()==0 AND !@routesGlobalSettingService.isAutoRoutingAfterApproval() AND doc.assocClass("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc") != null AND !doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:registration-required") AND doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signed-on-paper")

property.name: actionScript
actionScript
